text: Doctor Light is the name (or codename) of various fictional scientists. * Doctor Light (comics), any of the characters from DC Comics **Doctor Light (Arthur Light), the DC Comics supervillain ** Doctor Light (Kimiyo Hoshi), the DC Comics superheroine * Doctor Light (Mega Man), the Mega Man character ==See also== * The Light, an evil scientist who battled Starman fr:Dr. Light
title: Doctor Light
